allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add auto-intro system: play artist intros before matching tracks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "G:\\Misc\\Dev\\signalFlow" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GUI auto-intro dot indicator: dynamic has_intro computation in IPC layer

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "G:\\Misc\\Dev\\signalFlow" add gui/src/IntroSettings.tsx gui/src/App.tsx gui/src/styles.css gui/src/types.ts skills/auto_intro.md skills/changelog.md skills/gui.md skills/todo.md)

Bash(git -C "G:\\Misc\\Dev\\signalFlow" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GUI auto-intro config: modal dialog with folder picker, recurring interval/duck volume settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "G:\\Misc\\Dev\\signalFlow" add src/waveform.rs src/lib.rs src/main.rs src-tauri/src/main.rs gui/src/WaveformDisplay.tsx gui/src/TransportBar.tsx gui/src/types.ts gui/src/styles.css skills/todo.md skills/changelog.md skills/roadmap.md)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command 'Get-PSDrive -PSProvider FileSystem | Where-Object { $_.DisplayRoot } | Format-Table Name, DisplayRoot')

Bash(powershell.exe -Command 'Add-Type -TypeDefinition ""using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; using System.Text; public class Win32Api { [DllImport\(\\""mpr.dll\\"", CharSet=CharSet.Unicode\)] public static extern int WNetGetConnection\(string localName, StringBuilder remoteName, ref int length\); }""; [char[]]""ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"" | ForEach-Object { $d = ""${_}:""; $n = New-Object System.Text.StringBuilder 260; $len = 260; $r = [Win32Api]::WNetGetConnection\($d, $n, [ref]$len\); if \($r -eq 0\) { Write-Output ""$d -> $\($n.ToString\(\)\)"" } }')
